data.title: Cannabis Advisory Committee to Hold Upcoming December Meetings in Sacramento
data.excerpt: SACRAMENTO – The Bureau of Cannabis Control (Bureau) announced today that the Cannabis Advisory Committee will hold a subcommittee meeting on Tuesday, December 10 and a full committee meeting on Wednesday, December 11 at the Hilton Sacramento Arden West.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
